privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy and Terms of Service

infoCollection.title: 1. Information Collection
infoCollection.description: We may collect the following types of information:
items: Information you voluntarily provide, such as name and email address in contact forms
Automatically collected information, such as IP address, browser type, access time, etc.
Information collected through cookies and similar technologies

infoUsage.title: 2. Information Usage
infoUsage.description: The information we collect may be used for the following purposes:
items: To provide, maintain and improve our services
To process your requests and respond to your inquiries
To send information and services you request
To monitor website usage to improve user experience

infoSharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
infoSharing.description: We do not sell, trade or transfer your personal information to third parties unless we obtain your consent or are required by law. We may share information with the following entities:
items: Service providers, such as website hosting, data analysis, etc.

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction. However, please note that no internet transmission method or electronic storage method is 100% secure.

cookiePolicy.title: 5. Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze website usage and provide personalized content. You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings.

contactUs.title: 6. Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, please contact us through:

serviceOverview.title: 1. Service Overview
serviceOverview.description: Dabing AI Development website (hereinafter referred to as "this website") provides AI intelligent development technology related information and services. By accessing or using this website, you agree to abide by these terms of service.

useLicense.title: 2. Use License
useLicense.description: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use this website for personal or commercial purposes, provided you comply with these terms.

userBehavior.title: 3. User Behavior
userBehavior.description: When using this website, you agree not to:
items: Violate any applicable laws and regulations
Infringe on the intellectual property rights of others
Post or transmit any harmful, threatening, defamatory, obscene or other illegal or inappropriate content
Interfere with or disrupt the operation of the website or server
Unauthorized access or use of any part of the website

intellectualProperty.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: This website and all its content, including but not limited to text, graphics, images, software and other materials, are protected by copyright, trademark and other intellectual property laws. Without our express written permission, you may not copy, modify, distribute, display, perform or create derivative works based on the content of this website.

disclaimer.title: 5. Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: This website is provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness or reliability of the website content, nor do we guarantee that the website will run uninterrupted or error-free.

limitationOfLiability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.description: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special or consequential damages, whether based on contract, tort or other legal theory, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.

serviceChanges.title: 7. Service Changes
serviceChanges.description: We reserve the right to modify or terminate the service at any time without notice. We shall not be liable to you or any third party for any modification, price change, suspension or discontinuation of the service.

termsChanges.title: 8. Terms Changes
termsChanges.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms of service at any time. The updated terms will be posted on this website and will take effect immediately. Your continued use of this website indicates that you accept the modified terms.

contactUs.title: 9. Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have any questions about these terms of service, please contact us through:
